summonerSpells.name: Flash
summonerSpells.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
summonerSpells.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

summonerSpells.name: Smite
summonerSpells.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
summonerSpells.tooltip:
Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ f6 }} (+{{ f7 }}) Health.

Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 70 - 120 for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 10 - 120 (+3% of your maximum health) (+15% of your bonus attack damage) (+10% of your ability power)
Cooldown: 35s

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage, you're both hasted and granted a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Guard allies within 175 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take damage, both of you gain a shield and are hasted for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 0.25% of your ability power + 12% of your bonus health.
Haste: +20% Movement Speed.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 4s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 175 (+30% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDesc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 15-40 less damage.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 45s
runes.longDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 15-40 less damage.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
runes.longDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.

runes.name: Chrysalis
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with an extra 50 health. At 4 takedowns, consume that health to gain an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of 9 Attack Damage or 15 Ability Power.
runes.longDesc: Start the game with an extra 50 health. At 4 takedowns, consume that health to gain an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of 9 Attack Damage or 15 Ability Power.

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc: Permanently gain 0.2% maximum health for every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on low health targets.
runes.longDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a short duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 15% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for 10s. Additionally, gain 10% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc:
Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemy champions or shielding allies.

Damage: 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD)
Shield: 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP and +0.4 bonus AD)

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 3s grants 25 - 40% Movement Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDesc: Shortly after casting your Ultimate, gain a decaying movement speed increase that lasts for 2.5s and allows you to pass through units.
runes.longDesc:
Shortly after casting your Ultimate, gain a decaying movement speed increase that lasts for 2.5s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 100 Movement Speed
Cooldown: 60s, reduced by Cooldown Reduction

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc: Gain 10% <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_CDR'>CDR</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10.

Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: Gain 1.5% extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain extra AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> based on your bonus MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 1.5% increased Movement Speed.
Your Bonus Movement Speed is converted to Attack Damage or Ability Power, adaptive at a rate of 6% Attack Damage or 10% Ability Power.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 24 Attack Damage or 40 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 3 Attack Damage or 5 Ability Power at level 1.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.longDesc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 10 - 30 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 25 Movement Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

itemsBought.name: The Black Cleaver
itemsBought.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 4% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 24%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.
itemsBought.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor

itemsBought.name: Ninja Tabi
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

+20 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 12% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
itemsBought.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage

itemsBought.name: Long Sword
itemsBought.description: <stats>+10 Attack Damage</stats>
itemsBought.plaintext: Slightly increases Attack Damage

itemsBought.name: Long Sword
itemsBought.description: <stats>+10 Attack Damage</stats>
itemsBought.plaintext: Slightly increases Attack Damage

itemsBought.name: Enchantment: Warrior
itemsBought.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

Limited to 1 Gold Income or Jungle item.
itemsBought.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage and Cooldown Reduction

itemsBought.name: Oracle Lens
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Scans around you, warning against hidden hostile units, and revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling nearby wards for 10 seconds (90 to 60 second cooldown).
itemsBought.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

summonerSpells.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc: Permanently gain 0.2% maximum health for every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on low health targets.
runes.longDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a short duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 15% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for 10s. Additionally, gain 10% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

runes.name: Kleptomancy
runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 20s (initial swap cooldown is at 4 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Boots at 10 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 30s sooner.

Slightly Magical Boots give you an additional +10 Movement Speed.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Stasis'>Stasis</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> effect.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 10 min. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonya's Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle Stoneplate by 15%.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 240s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +4% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +1% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 3 min, until 12 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 3 mins, until 12 min.

Biscuits restore 15% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 20% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR
runes.longDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby ally champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> or enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 15% Movement Speed towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair.

Range: 1000

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.
runes.longDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.

itemsBought.name: Sterak's Gage
itemsBought.description:
+450 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Giant Strength: Gain 50% of your Base Attack Damage as Bonus Attack Damage
UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain a shield for 75% of your bonus Health. After 0.75 seconds, the shield decays over 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Sterak's Fury: When Lifeline triggers, grow in size and strength, gaining +30% Tenacity for 8 seconds.
itemsBought.plaintext: Shields against large bursts of damage

itemsBought.name: Mercury's Treads
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 30%.
itemsBought.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects

itemsBought.name: The Black Cleaver
itemsBought.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 4% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 24%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.
itemsBought.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor

+60 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

Limited to 1 Gold Income or Jungle item.

itemsBought.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

summonerSpells.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
summonerSpells.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

summonerSpells.name: Ignite
summonerSpells.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 80-505 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
summonerSpells.tooltip:
Ignite deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies Grievous Wounds for the duration.

(Grievous Wounds reduces healing effects by 40%. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
runes.longDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.

runes.name: Chrysalis
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with an extra 50 health. At 4 takedowns, consume that health to gain an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of 9 Attack Damage or 15 Ability Power.
runes.longDesc: Start the game with an extra 50 health. At 4 takedowns, consume that health to gain an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of 9 Attack Damage or 15 Ability Power.

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc: Permanently gain 0.2% maximum health for every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on low health targets.
runes.longDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a short duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 15% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for 10s. Additionally, gain 10% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

runes.name: Kleptomancy
runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 20s (initial swap cooldown is at 4 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Boots at 10 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 30s sooner.

Slightly Magical Boots give you an additional +10 Movement Speed.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Stasis'>Stasis</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> effect.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 10 min. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonya's Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle Stoneplate by 15%.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 240s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +4% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +1% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 3 min, until 12 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 3 mins, until 12 min.

Biscuits restore 15% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 20% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR
runes.longDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby ally champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> or enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 15% Movement Speed towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair.

Range: 1000

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.
runes.longDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.

itemsBought.name: Remnant of the Aspect
itemsBought.description:
+350 Health
+200% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+1 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 320 (+20 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health (+2% missing health) and grants them kill Gold. 50% healing if the owner is ranged. These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 20 seconds. Max 4 charges.
QUEST: Earn 500 gold using this item.
REWARD: Gain UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

Limited to 1 Gold Income or Jungle item.
itemsBought.plaintext: Provides Health and Stealth Wards over time

itemsBought.name: Zeke's Convergence
itemsBought.description:
+60 Armor
+30 Magic Resist
+250 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Active - Conduit: Bind to an ally without an existing Conduit.
UNIQUE Passive: Casting your ultimate near your ally surrounds you with a frost storm and ignites your ally's basic attacks for 10 seconds. Enemies inside your frost storm are slowed by 20% and your ally's attacks burn their target for 50% bonus magic damage over 2 seconds (45 second cooldown).

Frostfire Covenant: Your frost storm ignites when it slows a burning enemy, dealing 40 magic damage per second and slowing by 40% instead for 3 seconds.

(Champions can only be linked by one Zeke's Convergence at a time.)
itemsBought.plaintext: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.

itemsBought.name: Kindlegem
itemsBought.description:
+200 Health

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
itemsBought.plaintext: Increases Health and Cooldown Reduction

itemsBought.name: Boots of Mobility
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +115 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.
itemsBought.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat

itemsBought.name: Oracle Lens
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Scans around you, warning against hidden hostile units, and revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling nearby wards for 10 seconds (90 to 60 second cooldown).
itemsBought.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

summonerSpells.name: Flash
summonerSpells.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
summonerSpells.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

summonerSpells.name: Smite
summonerSpells.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
summonerSpells.tooltip:
Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ f6 }} (+{{ f7 }}) Health.

Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc:
Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemy champions or shielding allies.

Damage: 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD)
Shield: 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP and +0.4 bonus AD)

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 3s grants 25 - 40% Movement Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDesc: Shortly after casting your Ultimate, gain a decaying movement speed increase that lasts for 2.5s and allows you to pass through units.
runes.longDesc:
Shortly after casting your Ultimate, gain a decaying movement speed increase that lasts for 2.5s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 100 Movement Speed
Cooldown: 60s, reduced by Cooldown Reduction

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc: Gain 10% <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_CDR'>CDR</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10.

Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: Gain 1.5% extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain extra AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> based on your bonus MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 1.5% increased Movement Speed.
Your Bonus Movement Speed is converted to Attack Damage or Ability Power, adaptive at a rate of 6% Attack Damage or 10% Ability Power.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 24 Attack Damage or 40 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 3 Attack Damage or 5 Ability Power at level 1.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.longDesc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 10 - 30 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 25 Movement Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 20% missing health instead.

+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR

+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR

Range: 1000

runes.longDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.

itemsBought.name: Enchantment: Warrior
itemsBought.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

Limited to 1 Gold Income or Jungle item.
itemsBought.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage and Cooldown Reduction

itemsBought.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
itemsBought.description:
+55 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +21 Lethality
UNIQUE Passive - Blackout: When spotted by an enemy ward, reveal traps and disable wards around you for 8 seconds. Melee attacks instantly kill these devices. (90 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive - Nightstalker: After being unseen for at least 1 second, your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 30 - 150 bonus physical damage and slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds. Ranged basic attacks do not apply the slow. (Lasts for 5 seconds after being seen by an enemy champion).
itemsBought.plaintext: Deals additional physical damage when ambushing enemies and provides trap and ward detection periodically

itemsBought.name: Guardian Angel
itemsBought.description:
+45 Attack Damage
+40 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% of base Health and 30% of maximum Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
itemsBought.plaintext: Periodically revives champion upon death

itemsBought.name: Boots of Mobility
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +115 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.
itemsBought.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat

itemsBought.name: Stormrazor
itemsBought.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+35% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive: If you haven't attacked in the last 3 seconds (scaling down with your attack speed), gain Storm's Edge.

Storm's Edge: Your next basic attack critically strikes for 140% (+1% per 0.5% critical strike chance, max 200%) damage and grants 20% movement speed for 0.75 seconds.
itemsBought.plaintext: Start fights with a flurry of critical strikes

itemsBought.name: Oracle Lens
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Scans around you, warning against hidden hostile units, and revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling nearby wards for 10 seconds (90 to 60 second cooldown).
itemsBought.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

summonerSpells.name: Flash
summonerSpells.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
summonerSpells.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

summonerSpells.name: Smite
summonerSpells.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
summonerSpells.tooltip:
Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ f6 }} (+{{ f7 }}) Health.

Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 70 - 120 for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 10 - 120 (+3% of your maximum health) (+15% of your bonus attack damage) (+10% of your ability power)
Cooldown: 35s

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage, you're both hasted and granted a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Guard allies within 175 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take damage, both of you gain a shield and are hasted for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 0.25% of your ability power + 12% of your bonus health.
Haste: +20% Movement Speed.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 4s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 175 (+30% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDesc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 15-40 less damage.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 45s
runes.longDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 15-40 less damage.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 45s

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
runes.longDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.

runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 15% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for 10s. Additionally, gain 10% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

runes.name: Kleptomancy
runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 20s (initial swap cooldown is at 4 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Boots at 10 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 30s sooner.

Slightly Magical Boots give you an additional +10 Movement Speed.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Stasis'>Stasis</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> effect.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 10 min. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonya's Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle Stoneplate by 15%.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 240s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +4% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +1% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 3 min, until 12 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 3 mins, until 12 min.

Biscuits restore 15% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 20% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR
runes.longDesc:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby ally champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> or enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain 15% Movement Speed towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair.

Range: 1000

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.
runes.longDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last 20% longer, and you gain 5% Movement Speed while under their effects.

itemsBought.name: Enchantment: Warrior
itemsBought.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

Limited to 1 Gold Income or Jungle item.
itemsBought.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage and Cooldown Reduction

itemsBought.name: The Black Cleaver
itemsBought.description:
+400 Health
+40 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 4% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 24%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.
itemsBought.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor

itemsBought.name: Ninja Tabi
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

+20 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 12% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
itemsBought.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage

itemsBought.name: Control Ward
itemsBought.description:
Can only carry 3 Control Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Places a ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal invisible traps and reveal / disable wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards. Camouflaged units will also be revealed.

Limit 1 Control Ward on the map per player.
itemsBought.plaintext: Used to disable wards and invisible traps in an area.

itemsBought.name: Oracle Lens
itemsBought.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Scans around you, warning against hidden hostile units, and revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling nearby wards for 10 seconds (90 to 60 second cooldown).
itemsBought.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration
